name: Demon Dice Summoner
description:
Roll the Dice to Summon demons. 

there are six sides of the dice. some of which you can use as material straight away. 

such as salt and sigil. 

but to get fire your roll must contain at least 1 candle and 1 coal. 

collect all the materials for the summon condition, but watch out for the failure condition and watch out for your sanity!
